title: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately applies changes
description: Bug 14197: When removing a working set, the package view in the background refilters immediately. This behavior is unexpected.
OB: When I remove a working set, the package view in the background refilters immediately.
EB: The refiltering should only occur when closing the working set selection dialog, not during the manipulation of working sets. Additionally, pressing 'Cancel' should cancel all changes made to the working sets, including the removal operation.
SR: Steps to reproduce:1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view should be filtered.2. Open the working set dialog again, create a second working set, and then delete the first working set.
